text: Equal employment opportunity is a continuing responsibility of every agency, whether or not the hiring and promotion goals in affirmative action employment plans have been reached.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 1-512.

1973 Ed., § 1-320f.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-63, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-521.01.

DC CODE § 1-521.06

Current through December 11, 2012

subchapter.text: Affirmative Action in District Government Employment.

heading.catch_text: Continuing responsibility of agencies for equal employment opportunity.
